name: Hidden Lattice
author: Sacred Shifter Collective
description: The unseen geometry behind existence starts emerging. Low-opacity sacred geometry grids and crystalline lines reveal themselves only under coherence. The blueprint of reality becomes visible. Patterns that were always there, now seen.
metaphysicalNotes: Hidden Lattice reveals the geometric blueprint underlying reality. Stillness creates stability. Coherence creates clarity. The sacred structures that organize existence become visible through sustained attention.
